definitions.definition: An ancient Iranian prophet after whom the indigenous Iranian ethnic religion, Zoroastrianism , is named, also venerated in Mithraism .
Pseudepigraphic name used by various Ancient Greek and Latin authors of late antiquity to lend weight to their opinions.

main_definition: An ancient Iranian prophet after whom the indigenous Iranian ethnic religion, Zoroastrianism , is named, also venerated in Mithraism .
secondary_definitions: Pseudepigraphic name used by various Ancient Greek and Latin authors of late antiquity to lend weight to their opinions.
